overview: Hole 1, is a voyeur's paradise — a gritty tale of what men will do when they’re confined. These striking studs are deprived of sunlight and any regular comforts, but they are given one simple luxury: another man to feed their voracious desires. The directors of this feature, Tony Dimarco and Adam Killian, create a rough, run-down institutional world, and they fill the “Hole” with hung studs and hot bottoms. Every action is caught by closed-circuit monitors that are pumped into every cell.
tagline: Everyone's testosterone reaches critical mass in Hole 1.
title: Hole 1
